title: What was the first TV theme song to hit number one on the charts? - Quora

response.answer_text: Three TV themes have made it to the top of Billboard's chart in the US. S.W.A.T., theme from S.W.A.T. (1975-1979) by Rhythm Heritage Welcome Back, theme from Welcome Back, Kotter (1975-1979) by John Sebastian Miami Vice, theme from Miami Vice (1984-1989) by Jan Hammer Feb 26, 1976 - S.W.A.T.May 8, 1976 - Welcome BackNov 9, 1985 - Miami Vice
